channel.title: Comments on: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

item.title: By: Wreak
item.dc:creator: Wreak
item.description: You forget that you have the whole Horde side of the story to enjoy, and surprisingly lots of different avenues to level up (so far i've levelled 2 chars on horde to 35 (one tauren, one undead), and I despise doing the same quests).
item.content:encoded: You forget that you have the whole Horde side of the story to enjoy, and surprisingly lots of different avenues to level up (so far i’ve levelled 2 chars on horde to 35 (one tauren, one undead), and I despise doing the same quests).
